name: Dam
description:
The local dam's structural integrity has decided to fail and it's up to you, the local bandaid-wielding hero, to save the day.

This game was created in 48 hours for the global game jam, whose theme for 2020 was "repair".

List of cool things:

  • when a bandaid lands on the wall,  the graphic is saved into the wall graphic and the game object itself is removed
  • parallax scrolling background multiple layers
  • the draw call uses a stencil buffer to only draw graphics on top of non-transparent pixels (forming cracks on the wall graphic)
